name: TacticToy
description:
TacticToy — is an incarnation of ultimate tic-tac-toe game: rules are simple, but the gameplay is fascinating. Here you can change dimension and depth of game board creating custom desks! Compete with friends or AI bots ;) You can find the rules here or in the game itself.

The game was released in 2016 for Web (HTML5), iOS, Android with multiplayer mode and many languages, but mobile versions & server  got closed due to low activity. However, the web version of the game is still amazing, and I play it with my friends for many years. Hopefully, TacticToy will gain more fans and get a new version. To achieve this, support the project with donates, sharing & nice comments ^_^
